title: 7.3 Bloodmoon Event Super High Ping Help?
body:
Hello Everyone I could really use some help on this one. 

So I started playing League around September last year and I have been having very good performance on my PC with average FPS over 200 and ping under 50ms consistently. After the Bloodmoon update I have been getting random ping spikes and I have absolutely no idea why. My ping in most games is below 50ms but every 30 or 40 seconds my ping will spike to 500+. Some of my friends who I have been playing with said that they weren't having a similar problem. 

At this point I have tried:
Uninstalling and reinstalling the game
Uninstalling my wifi card and reinstalling the wifi card
Checking the wifi antennas to see if they if they were covered by wired
Reinstalling my wifi card's drivers

I have run out of ideas  so any help is greatly appreciated. :D

replies.body: It sounds like you're experiencing packet loss, which can appear as sudden and high ping spikes.  Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) to know for sure. This will help us get an overview of your network and determine if there's something going on with how your connection is getting to the game servers.  Reinstalling won't really resolve this if it's a network problem.  Let me know!

It looks like the issue is packet loss. The log reader says

"Your average ping was 53 milliseconds.

The worst ping you experienced was 379ms. This means you experienced high ping during this game, which is likely where you were seeing issues. See below for a few recommendations to help out with this.


Your average percentage of packet loss for this game was 0.61%.

Overall, this means you had a high amount of packets lost during the game. This can be caused by various network issues, so please see below for a few common steps that can help reduce packet loss."


I am going to try the solutions in a bit and get back to you.
It's good that we were able to confirm this, so thanks for the update!  Let me know the results!
I've tried using the suggestions but none of them have seemed to work.  I am still getting severe packet loss.
